Package monsterfighter.core

Class TrainerBattle

java.lang.Object
monsterfighter.core.Battle
monsterfighter.core.TrainerBattle
public class TrainerBattle extends Battle
Class that models a trainer battle

    TrainerBattle(int gold, int points, ArrayList<Monster> monsters, String trainer)
    Constructs a trainer battle with a set number of points, an array of Monster's, a set amount of gold and a name for the trainer.

  • Constructor Details

    • TrainerBattle

      public TrainerBattle(int gold, int points, ArrayList<Monster> monsters, String trainer)
      Constructs a trainer battle with a set number of points, an array of Monster's, a set amount of gold and a name for the trainer.
      Parameters:
      gold - The amount of gold that the battle should award upon victory
      points - The amount of points that the battle should award upon victory
      monsters - The list of Monster's that may appear in the Battle
      trainer - The name of the monster trainer

  • Method Details

    • getGold

      public int getGold()
      Gets the amount of gold for this Battle.
      Returns:
      The amount of gold for this Battle

    • getTrainer

      public String getTrainer()
      Gets the name of the trainer.
      Returns:
      The trainer's name

    • battleStatus

      public String battleStatus()
      Gets a battle description used for a command line UI implementation of a battle.
      Overrides:
      battleStatus in class Battle
      Returns:
      A description that includes the trainer's name, number of Monster.Status.CONSCIOUS Monster's and leading monster.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a basic description of this trainer battle.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Battle
      Returns:
      A description that includes the trainer's name, number of monsters, points awarded and gold given
